name: Sklearn XGBoost Regressor
description: XGBoost Regressor for regression tasks. It implements gradient boosted decision trees designed for speed and performance.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Feature columns of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: n_estimators
fields.title: Number of Estimators
fields.description: Number of boosting rounds (trees).

fields.name: max_depth
fields.title: Max Depth
fields.description: Maximum depth of a tree. Increasing makes model more complex.

fields.name: learning_rate
fields.title: Learning Rate
fields.description: Boosting learning rate (xgb's eta).

fields.name: subsample
fields.title: Subsample
fields.description: Subsample ratio of the training instance.

fields.name: colsample_bytree
fields.title: Colsample Bytree
fields.description: Subsample ratio of columns when constructing each tree.

fields.name: colsample_bylevel
fields.title: Colsample Bylevel
fields.description: Subsample ratio of columns for each split, in each level.

fields.name: colsample_bynode
fields.title: Colsample Bynode
fields.description: Subsample ratio of columns for each split, in each node.

fields.name: reg_alpha
fields.title: Reg Alpha (L1)
fields.description: L1 regularization term on weights.

fields.name: reg_lambda
fields.title: Reg Lambda (L2)
fields.description: L2 regularization term on weights.

fields.name: gamma
fields.title: Gamma
fields.description: Minimum loss reduction required to make a further partition on a leaf node.

fields.name: min_child_weight
fields.title: Min Child Weight
fields.description: Minimum sum of instance weight needed in a child.

fields.name: max_delta_step
fields.title: Max Delta Step
fields.description: Maximum delta step allowed for each treeâ€™s weight estimation.

fields.name: random_state
fields.title: Random State
fields.description: Random number seed.

fields.name: n_jobs
fields.title: Number of Jobs
fields.description: Number of parallel threads used to run xgboost.

fields.name: verbosity
fields.title: Verbosity
fields.description: Verbosity of printing messages (0 = silent, 1 = warning, 2 = info, 3 = debug).

fields.name: booster
fields.title: Booster
fields.description: Specify which booster to use.

fields.name: tree_method
fields.title: Tree Method
fields.description: Tree construction algorithm used in XGBoost.

fields.name: objective
fields.title: Objective
fields.description: Learning task and objective function.

fields.name: eval_metric
fields.title: Evaluation Metric
fields.description: Evaluation metric for validation data.

fields.name: early_stopping_rounds
fields.title: Early Stopping Rounds
fields.description: Activates early stopping. Validation metric needs to improve at least once in every given rounds.
